verses.verse: A Psalm. Oh <S%H7891>sing<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> a <S%H2319>new<s%> <S%H7892>song<s%>; For he hath <S%H6213>done<s%> marvellous <S%H6381>things<s%>: His right <S%H3225>hand<s%>, and his <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H2220>arm<s%>, hath wrought salvation for <S%H3467>him<s%>.
Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> hath made <S%H3045>known<s%> his <S%H3444>salvation<s%>: His <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> hath he openly <S%H1540>showed<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of the <S%H1471>nations<s%>.

He hath <S%H2142>remembered<s%> his <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%> and his <S%H530>faithfulness<s%> toward the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>: All the <S%H657>ends<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%> have <S%H7200>seen<s%> the <S%H3444>salvation<s%> of our <S%H430>God<s%>.
Make a joyful <S%H7321>noise<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, all the <S%H776>earth<s%>: Break forth and <S%H2167>sing<s%> for <S%H7442>joy<s%>, <S%H2167>yea<s%>, sing praises.
Sing <S%H2167><s%> praises unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> with the <S%H3658>harp<s%>; With the <S%H3658>harp<s%> and the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of <S%H2172>melody<s%>.
With <S%H2689>trumpets<s%> and <S%H6963>sound<s%> of <S%H7782>cornet<s%> Make a joyful <S%H7321>noise<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H4428>King<s%>, <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.
Let the <S%H3220>sea<s%> <S%H7481>roar<s%>, and the <S%H4393>fulness<s%> <S%H8398>thereof<s%>; The world, and they that dwell <S%H3427>therein<s%>;
Let the <S%H5104>floods<s%> <S%H4222>clap<s%> their <S%H3709>hands<s%>; Let the <S%H2022>hills<s%> sing for <S%H7442>joy<s%> <S%H3162>together<s%>

Before <S%H6440><s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>; For he <S%H935>cometh<s%> to <S%H8199>judge<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%>: He will <S%H8199>judge<s%> the <S%H8398>world<s%> with <S%H6664>righteousness<s%>, And the <S%H5971>peoples<s%> with <S%H4339>equity<s%>.
